modules.name: sn-vco
modules.description: sn experimental additive synthesizer VCO. Implements continuous smooth morphing between waveshapes.

modules.name: sn-vcox
modules.description: sn experimental additive synthesizer VCO expander. Adds synchronized harmonics to the base waveshape generated by the sn-vco module.

modules.name: sn-lfo
modules.description: sn experimental additive synthesizer LFO. Implements continuous smooth morphing between waveshapes.

modules.name: sn-lfox
modules.description: sn experimental additive synthesizer LFO expander. Adds synchronized harmonics to the base waveshape generated by sn-lfo.
